ground_truth: She puts them down and is surprised to see Miranda sitting on the couch with her glasses in her hand, just staring into space. She's wearing a dressing gown and has no makeup on. Miranda has her hand held out for them. Andy holds out a folder, which Miranda ungraciously accepts. Andy's taken aback. Andy glances down at the papers in her lap, and then looks across at Miranda with sympathy. Miranda hands back the seating chart. Back in her own suite, Andy has changed into a slim-fitting low cut black suit. She studies her reflection in a big mirror and touches up the mascara on her long, black lashes. Nigel comes in and studies the outfit she's wearing. They raise their glasses. Andy and Christian in an elegant restaurant. After dinner, they stroll near the Notredam Cathedral. She swings around a lamppost. Christian kisses her. He kisses her again and again. She kisses him back, wrapping her arm around his neck. They are surrounded by bare trees adorned with fairy lights. There's a view of the Eiffel Tower from Christian's hotel bedroom window. Andy wakes up in his bed alone, and puts her hand to her head with a grimace. She rolls over and consults her watch on the bedside table. Pulled on her clothes and is hopping around about trying to put her shoes on. Andy goes to grab her jacket and knocks over Christian's bag. Christian comes out of the bathroom in a towel. Andy grabs her stuff and goes. Walking along a modern bridge over the sand, she calls Miranda's suite. Andy gets back to the hotel and pauses before knocking on Miranda's door. Miranda and Irv shut the door in her face. She's changed into a black dress with a scoop neck, a full skirt with petticoats, and wears black gloves and a silver necklace. At the event, she paces the hallway. Nigel steps down from the podium. Miranda makes her way over from the table she's been sitting at. They had gathered in a plush banqueting suite with chandeliers hanging from the ceiling. Andy spies Christian sitting with Jacqueline. Miranda kisses Nigel before taking her place. James gets up and salutes his fans. Andy and Nigel smile over at him. Nigel's excited smile fades and he looks up at Miranda crestfallen. Pretty Jacqueline beams delightedly. Nigel puts on a brave face and applauds her. Jacqueline stands. Andy looks over at Miranda incredulously. Up on the podium, Miranda smiles and applauds Jacqueline as Irv eyes her coolly. Andy glances over at Christian, who looks stunned. James preens himself smugly. Nigel fidgets in his seat. Later, Andy gets into the back of a smart, black executive car, which is parked outside the venue.

test_cases.name: Synonym Substitution
test_cases.description: She places them down and is astonished to observe Miranda seated on the sofa with her spectacles in her hand, merely gazing into void. She's clad in a robe and has no cosmetics on. Miranda has her hand extended for them. Andy extends a dossier, which Miranda gracelessly receives. Andy's stunned. Andy peeks down at the documents in her lap, and then looks across at Miranda with compassion. Miranda returns the seating chart. Back in her own suite, Andy has changed into a sleek-fitting low cut ebony suit. She examines her reflection in a large mirror and retouches the mascara on her lengthy, ebony lashes. Nigel enters and examines the attire she's wearing. They lift their glasses. Andy and Christian in a sophisticated eatery. After supper, they saunter near the Notredam Cathedral. She twirls around a lamppost. Christian kisses her. He kisses her again and again. She kisses him back, wrapping her arm around his neck. They are surrounded by barren trees adorned with fairy lights. There's a view of the Eiffel Tower from Christian's hotel room window. Andy wakes up in his bed alone, and places her hand to her head with a grimace. She rolls over and checks her watch on the bedside table. Pulled on her attire and is hopping around about attempting to put her shoes on. Andy goes to seize her jacket and knocks over Christian's bag. Christian emerges from the bathroom in a towel. Andy seizes her belongings and departs. Strolling along a contemporary bridge over the sand, she calls Miranda's suite. Andy returns to the hotel and hesitates before knocking on Miranda's door. Miranda and Irv close the door in her face. She's changed into a black dress with a scoop neck, a full skirt with petticoats, and wears black gloves and a silver necklace. At the occasion, she paces the corridor. Nigel descends from the podium. Miranda makes her way over from the table she's been seated at. They had gathered in a luxurious banqueting suite with chandeliers suspended from the ceiling. Andy notices Christian seated with Jacqueline. Miranda kisses Nigel before taking her position. James rises and salutes his supporters. Andy and Nigel grin over at him. Nigel's enthusiastic grin fades and he looks up at Miranda despondently. Pretty Jacqueline beams delightedly. Nigel dons a brave face and applauds her. Jacqueline stands. Andy looks over at Miranda incredulously. Up on the podium, Miranda smiles and applauds Jacqueline as Irv eyes her coolly. Andy glances over at Christian, who looks stupefied. James preens himself smugly. Nigel squirms in his seat. Later, Andy gets into the back of a stylish, black executive car, which is parked outside the venue.

test_cases.name: Active <-> Passive Transformation
test_cases.description: They are put down by her, and Miranda is seen sitting on the couch with her glasses in her hand, just staring into space. A dressing gown is worn by her, and no makeup is on. Her hand is held out by Miranda for them. A folder is held out by Andy, which is ungraciously accepted by Miranda. Andy is taken aback. The papers in her lap are glanced down at by Andy, and then Miranda is looked across at with sympathy. The seating chart is handed back by Miranda. Back in her own suite, a slim-fitting low cut black suit has been changed into by Andy. Her reflection is studied by her in a big mirror and the mascara on her long, black lashes is touched up. The outfit she's wearing is studied by Nigel as he comes in. Their glasses are raised by them. Andy and Christian are seen in an elegant restaurant. After dinner, a stroll is taken by them near the Notre Dame Cathedral. A lamppost is swung around by her. She is kissed by Christian. She is kissed again and again by him. He is kissed back by her, as her arm is wrapped around his neck. Bare trees adorned with fairy lights surround them. A view of the Eiffel Tower is seen from Christian's hotel bedroom window. Alone in his bed, Andy wakes up, and her hand is put to her head with a grimace. She rolls over and her watch is consulted on the bedside table. Her clothes are pulled on and she is hopping around trying to put her shoes on. Her jacket is grabbed by Andy and Christian's bag is knocked over. Christian, in a towel, comes out of the bathroom. Her stuff is grabbed by Andy and she goes. As a modern bridge over the sand is walked along by her, Miranda's suite is called. Back to the hotel, Andy gets and pauses before Miranda's door is knocked on. The door is shut in her face by Miranda and Irv. A black dress with a scoop neck, a full skirt with petticoats is changed into by her, and black gloves and a silver necklace are worn. At the event, the hallway is paced by her. Nigel steps down from the podium. Her way is made over by Miranda from the table she's been sitting at. They gathered in a plush banqueting suite with chandeliers hanging from the ceiling. Christian sitting with Jacqueline is spied by Andy. Nigel is kissed by Miranda before her place is taken. His fans are saluted by James as he gets up. Andy and Nigel smile over at him. Nigel's excited smile fades, and Miranda is looked up at with a crestfallen expression by him. Delightedly beamed at by pretty Jacqueline. A brave face is put on by Nigel and she is applauded. Jacqueline stands. Incredulously, Miranda is looked over at by Andy. Up on the podium, Jacqueline is smiled and applauded at by Miranda as Irv eyes her coolly. Christian, who looks stunned, is glanced over at by Andy. James smugly preens himself. In his seat, Nigel fidgets. Later, Andy gets into the back of a smart, black executive car that is parked outside the venue.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: She puts them down and is surprised to see Miranda on the couch, glasses in hand, staring into space, wearing a dressing gown and no makeup. Miranda extends her hand for the folder, which Andy gives reluctantly. Andy glances at her lap papers, then at Miranda with sympathy, as Miranda returns the seating chart. In her suite, Andy changes into a slim, low-cut black suit, touches up her mascara, and Nigel studies her outfit. They raise glasses. Andy and Christian dine elegantly, stroll near Notre Dame Cathedral, she swings around a lamppost, and they kiss multiple times under fairy-lit bare trees, with an Eiffel Tower view from Christian's window. Andy wakes up, grimaces, checks her watch, dresses, knocks over Christian's bag, and leaves as he exits the bathroom in a towel. She calls Miranda's suite from a modern bridge. Back at the hotel, she pauses at Miranda's door as it's shut in her face. She's now in a black scoop-neck dress, full skirt, black gloves, and a silver necklace. At the event's plush suite with chandeliers, Nigel steps down from the podium. Miranda moves over, kisses Nigel, and takes her place. James salutes fans, Andy and Nigel smile. Nigel's smile fades, looks at Miranda, crestfallen; Jacqueline beams, and Nigel bravely applauds her. Andy looks at Miranda incredulously, who applauds Jacqueline, while Irv watches coolly. Andy glances at stunned Christian, while James preens smugly and Nigel fidgets. Later, Andy gets into a smart black car outside the venue.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L2
test_cases.description: Surprised, Andy finds Miranda staring into space on the couch, glasses in hand, wearing a dressing gown without makeup. Miranda extends her hand for a folder, which she accepts ungraciously. Andy glances at her papers, then sympathetically at Miranda, who returns the seating chart. In her suite, Andy changes into a slim black suit, touches up her mascara before Nigel enters to study her outfit. They toast. At an elegant restaurant, Andy and Christian stroll near Notre-Dame Cathedral post-dinner. Under fairy-lit trees, they kiss repeatedly, with a view of the Eiffel Tower from Christian's hotel room. Andy wakes alone with a grimace, hurriedly dresses, and accidentally spills Christian's bag. Christian emerges in a towel; Andy leaves quickly. Walking on a modern bridge, she calls Miranda's suite. Returning to the hotel, Miranda and Irv shut the door in her face. Dressed in a scoop-neck black dress, Andy paces at the event. In a banqueting suite, Nigel steps down from the podium as Miranda approaches. Christian sits with Jacqueline. Miranda kisses Nigel, then joins the table. James salutes his fans as Nigel's smile fades. Jacqueline beams as Nigel bravely applauds. Andy incredulously watches Miranda praise Jacqueline on the podium while Irv observes. Andy notices a stunned Christian and a smug James. Nigel fidgets. Later, Andy enters a smart black car outside the venue.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description:
She carefully places the items down and finds herself taken aback when she unexpectedly notices Miranda seated comfortably on the couch, holding her glasses in one hand and gazing silently into space with an air of contemplation. Miranda, in a state of casual relaxation, is wrapped in a cozy dressing gown and devoid of any makeup. Without speaking, Miranda extends her hand expectantly towards her. In response, Andy, somewhat hesitantly, extends a folder in return, which Miranda accepts with a lack of grace that surprises Andy. Feeling a little shaken, Andy glances down thoughtfully at the stack of papers resting on her lap, then directs a look filled with sympathy towards Miranda. Miranda, in return, offers back the seating chart to Andy. 

Later, in the privacy of her own suite, Andy has transformed into a sleek, form-fitting black suit that accentuates her figure with a low-cut design. She meticulously examines her reflection in a large, elegant mirror, ensuring every detail is perfect as she carefully touches up the mascara on her long, dark lashes. Nigel makes his entrance, taking a moment to study the ensemble she's wearing with a discerning eye. Together, they raise their glasses in a silent toast.

The scene shifts to an elegant restaurant where Andy and Christian are enjoying a refined dining experience. After their delightful meal, they leisurely stroll near the picturesque Notre Dame Cathedral. Andy playfully swings around a lamppost, her laughter echoing in the night air. Christian seizes the moment to affectionately kiss her, and then, unable to resist, kisses her once more, again and again. She warmly returns his kisses, wrapping an affectionate arm around his neck. The couple is enveloped by bare trees that are beautifully adorned with twinkling fairy lights. From Christian's hotel room window, there's a breathtaking view of the magnificent Eiffel Tower.

The next morning, Andy awakens in his bed, finding herself alone. She lets out a soft groan, putting a hand to her head with a grimace of mild regret. She rolls over in the bed and consults her watch, which rests on the nearby bedside table. Hastily throwing on her clothes, she hops around in an awkward dance while trying to put her shoes on. In her hurry, Andy reaches to grab her jacket and inadvertently knocks over Christian's bag. At that moment, Christian emerges from the bathroom, wrapped only in a towel. Without delay, Andy gathers her belongings and swiftly makes her exit.

As she walks across a sleek, modern bridge spanning the sand, she takes a moment to call Miranda's suite. Upon returning to the hotel, she pauses momentarily before nervously knocking on Miranda's door. The door opens only briefly before Miranda and Irv shut it in her face. Andy, now changed into a striking black dress with a graceful scoop neck and a full skirt enhanced by petticoats, complements her look with elegant black gloves and a shimmering silver necklace. At the event, restless and filled with anticipation, she paces the corridor. Nigel gracefully descends from the podium. Miranda elegantly makes her way over from the table where she's been seated.

The gathering takes place in a luxurious banqueting suite, lavishly decorated with exquisite chandeliers hanging from the ceiling. Andy notices Christian seated alongside Jacqueline, which draws her attention. Meanwhile, Miranda places a gentle kiss on Nigel before she assumes her position. James rises to his feet, offering a salute to his adoring fans. Andy and Nigel exchange smiles filled with shared admiration as they look at James. However, Nigel's once bright and excited smile gradually fades, leaving his expression crestfallen as he looks towards Miranda. The radiant Jacqueline beams with delight, and despite his disappointment, Nigel musters the strength to put on a brave face and applauds her moderately. Jacqueline stands up gracefully. Andy, unable to suppress her incredulity, looks over at Miranda. Up on the podium, Miranda beams with a smile and claps for Jacqueline, while Irv observes her with a cool, detached demeanor. Andy's gaze drifts towards Christian, who appears visibly stunned by the unfolding events. James, meanwhile, smugly preens himself. Nigel fidgets restlessly in his seat. Later, Andy slips into the back of a sleek, black executive car, which waits parked outside the grand venue.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description:
She carefully sets down the items she is carrying and finds herself momentarily taken aback when she unexpectedly notices Miranda seated comfortably on the plush couch. Miranda is holding her glasses in one hand, gazing silently into space with an air of deep contemplation. In a state of casual relaxation, Miranda is wrapped snugly in a cozy dressing gown and is noticeably devoid of any makeup. Without uttering a word, Miranda extends her hand toward Andy, who responds somewhat hesitantly by handing over a folder. Miranda accepts it with a lack of grace that takes Andy by surprise. Feeling slightly shaken, Andy thoughtfully glances down at the stack of papers resting on her lap, then directs a look filled with profound sympathy toward Miranda. In return, Miranda hands back the seating chart to Andy.

Later, in the secluded comfort of her own suite, Andy transforms her appearance by slipping into a sleek, form-fitting black suit that exquisitely accentuates her figure with its low-cut design. She meticulously examines her reflection in a large, elegant mirror, ensuring every detail of her appearance is flawless as she carefully touches up the mascara on her long, dark lashes. Nigel enters the room, taking a moment to study the ensemble she's wearing with a discerning, critical eye. Together, they each raise their glasses in a shared, silent toast.

The scene transitions to an elegant, sophisticated restaurant where Andy and Christian are enjoying a refined dining experience. After their delightful meal, they leisurely stroll near the picturesque Notre Dame Cathedral. Andy playfully swings around a lamppost, her laughter echoing joyfully in the night air. Christian seizes the moment to affectionately kiss her, and then, unable to resist, kisses her once more, again and again. She warmly returns his kisses, wrapping an affectionate, tender arm around his neck. The couple is surrounded by bare trees, beautifully adorned with twinkling fairy lights. From Christian's hotel room window, there's an absolutely breathtaking view of the magnificent Eiffel Tower, standing majestically in the horizon.

The next morning, Andy awakens in his bed, finding herself alone. She lets out a soft groan, placing a hand to her head with a grimace of mild regret. She rolls over in the bed and consults her watch, which rests on the nearby bedside table. Hastily, she throws on her clothes, hopping around in an awkward dance while trying to put her shoes on. In her hurry, Andy reaches to grab her jacket and inadvertently knocks over Christian's bag. At that precise moment, Christian emerges from the bathroom, wrapped only in a towel. Without any delay, Andy gathers her belongings and swiftly makes her exit.

As she walks across a sleek, modern bridge spanning the sand, she takes a brief moment to call Miranda's suite. After returning to the hotel, she pauses momentarily before nervously knocking on Miranda's door. The door opens only briefly, just before Miranda and Irv shut it in her face. Andy, now changed into a striking black dress with a graceful scoop neck and a full skirt enhanced by petticoats, complements her look with elegant black gloves and a shimmering silver necklace. At the event, restless and filled with anticipation, she paces the corridor. Nigel gracefully descends from the podium. Miranda elegantly makes her way over from the table where she's been seated.

The gathering takes place in a luxurious banqueting suite, lavishly decorated with exquisite chandeliers hanging majestically from the ceiling. Andy takes note of Christian seated alongside Jacqueline, which draws her attention. Meanwhile, Miranda places a gentle, affectionate kiss on Nigel before she assumes her position. James rises to his feet, offering a warm salute to his adoring fans. Andy and Nigel exchange smiles filled with mutual admiration as they look at James. However, Nigel's once bright and excited smile gradually fades, leaving his expression crestfallen as he looks toward Miranda. The radiant Jacqueline beams with delight, and despite his disappointment, Nigel musters the strength to put on a brave face and applauds her moderately. Jacqueline stands up gracefully. Andy, unable to suppress her incredulity, looks over at Miranda. Up on the podium, Miranda beams with a radiant smile and claps for Jacqueline, while Irv observes her with a cool, detached demeanor. Andy's gaze drifts toward Christian, who appears visibly stunned by the astonishing unfolding events. James, meanwhile, smugly preens himself. Nigel fidgets restlessly in his seat. Later, Andy slips into the back of a sleek, black executive car, which waits parked just outside the grand, opulent venue.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: She places the items down gently, only to be taken aback by the unexpected sight of Miranda lounging on the couch, glasses clasped loosely in her hand, her gaze fixed aimlessly into space. Miranda, enveloped in a casual dressing gown and devoid of any makeup, extends her hand silently, anticipating the deliverance of the documents. Responding to this unspoken request, Andy offers the folder, which Miranda accepts with a lack of grace that momentarily unsettles Andy. Andy’s eyes drift downwards, absorbing the sight of the papers resting in her lap, before darting back to Miranda, her expression softening with sympathy. Miranda, without much ado, returns the seating chart to Andy. In her own suite, Andy undergoes a transformation, slipping into a sleek, low-cut black suit that hugs her form. She stands before a large mirror, scrutinizing her reflection with a discerning eye, meticulously applying mascara to elongate her inky lashes. As Nigel enters the room, his eyes assessively travel over the outfit Andy has chosen, a silent approval exchanged as they clink their glasses in camaraderie. The scene shifts to Andy and Christian seated in an elegant restaurant, engaged in intimate conversation. Their evening unfolds further as they leisurely stroll near the majestic Notre Dame Cathedral, where Andy playfully twirls around a lamppost. Christian captures the moment to lean in and plant a kiss on her lips, a gesture he repeats with increasing fervor. She reciprocates, wrapping her arm around his neck, their surroundings a constellation of bare trees adorned with twinkling fairy lights. From the window of Christian's hotel room, the iconic silhouette of the Eiffel Tower stands in view. Morning arrives, and Andy awakens alone in his bed, placing a hand to her head as a grimace crosses her face, signifying the aftereffects of the previous night. She rolls over, consulting her watch on the bedside table with urgency. Hastily dressing, she hops on one foot to slide on her shoes, unintentionally knocking over Christian’s bag in her rush. Emerging from the bathroom, Christian is draped in a towel, while Andy hurriedly gathers her belongings and makes a swift exit. As she strides along a modern bridge spanning the sands, her phone call connects to Miranda’s suite mid-walk. Arriving back at the hotel, she hesitates momentarily before summoning the courage to knock on Miranda’s door, only to have it closed on her by Miranda and Irv. Andy has since changed into a sophisticated black dress featuring a scoop neck and a full skirt with petticoats, accessorized with black gloves and a silver necklace, suited for the event. She paces the hallways of the richly adorned banquet suite, chandeliers casting an opulent glow overhead, as Nigel descends from the podium. Observing Miranda making her way over from her seated position, Andy notes Christian seated alongside Jacqueline. Miranda exchanges a brief kiss with Nigel before assuming her place. James stands to salute his fans, prompting Andy and Nigel to exchange appreciative smiles. Nigel’s excitement dims, and he looks towards Miranda with a crestfallen expression as Jacqueline beams with delight. Adopting a façade of bravery, Nigel joins in the applause for her as Jacqueline rises. Andy casts a look of incredulity at Miranda while up on the podium, Miranda returns Jacqueline’s gesture with a smile and applause as Irv watches her coolly. Andy’s eyes dart to Christian, who appears equally shocked, while James basks in self-satisfaction. Nigel shifts uneasily in his seat. Later, Andy settles into the backseat of a sleek, black executive car idling outside the venue, contemplating the events that have transpired.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description: Andy is surprised to find Miranda in casual attire, holding her glasses and staring into space. After handing over a folder, which Miranda accepts without acknowledgment, Andy receives the seating chart back with sympathy for Miranda. In her suite, Andy changes into a stylish black suit, checks her reflection, and touches up her makeup. Nigel enters, assessing her outfit before they raise their glasses together. Later, Andy dines with Christian at an elegant restaurant, and they stroll by Notre Dame Cathedral. They share a series of intimate kisses under fairy lights and a view of the Eiffel Tower from Christian's hotel window. Andy wakes up alone in Christian’s bed, realizing the time with a grimace. She hurriedly dresses, knocking over his bag as he emerges from the bathroom, before leaving. On her way, Andy calls Miranda’s suite and returns to the hotel, hesitating before Miranda’s door. Miranda and Irv then shut the door in her face. Andy changes into a black dress for an event, pacing the hallway as Nigel finishes on the podium. In a banqueting suite with chandeliers, she notices Christian with Jacqueline. Miranda approaches after kissing Nigel, while James acknowledges his fans. Nigel’s excitement turns to disappointment as Jacqueline beams, and he applauds bravely when she stands. Andy observes the scene incredulously as Miranda applauds Jacqueline with Irv watching. Christian looks stunned, and James preens smugly as Nigel fidgets. Later, Andy leaves the venue in a sleek, black executive car.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: She puts them down and is surprised to see Miranda, the renowned editor of a major fashion magazine known for her impeccable style, sitting on the couch with her glasses in her hand, just staring into space. She's wearing a dressing gown, which is quite unusual for her typical fashion-forward appearance, and has no makeup on. Miranda has her hand held out for them. Andy holds out a folder, which Miranda ungraciously accepts, a rare break from her usual authoritative grace. Andy's taken aback. Andy glances down at the papers in her lap, filled with layout designs for the upcoming issue, and then looks across at Miranda with sympathy. Miranda hands back the seating chart, crucial for the upcoming gala dinner. Back in her own suite, located in a luxurious Parisian hotel, Andy has changed into a slim-fitting low cut black suit. She studies her reflection in a big mirror and touches up the mascara on her long, black lashes. Nigel, her sharp-eyed fashion mentor, comes in and studies the outfit she's wearing. They raise their glasses in a toast to the night. Andy and Christian dine in an elegant restaurant, famous for its view of the Seine River. After dinner, they stroll near the Notre Dame Cathedral, an iconic Gothic structure in the heart of Paris. She swings around a lamppost, reminiscent of classic romantic films. Christian kisses her softly, under the glow of streetlights. He kisses her again and again. She kisses him back, wrapping her arm around his neck. They are surrounded by bare trees adorned with fairy lights, casting a magical ambiance. There's a view of the Eiffel Tower, its lights twinkling in the night, from Christian's hotel bedroom window. Andy wakes up in his bed alone, and puts her hand to her head with a grimace, feeling the effects of a night well spent. She rolls over and consults her watch on the bedside table. Pulled on her clothes and is hopping around about trying to put her shoes on. Andy goes to grab her jacket and knocks over Christian's bag, filled with travel documents and souvenirs. Christian comes out of the bathroom in a towel, startled by the commotion. Andy grabs her stuff and goes, determined to keep her morning meetings. Walking along a modern bridge over the sand, a sleek architectural feat above the Seine, she calls Miranda's suite to check in. Andy gets back to the hotel and pauses before knocking on Miranda's door. Miranda and Irv, her hard-nosed publisher, shut the door in her face. She's changed into a black dress with a scoop neck, a full skirt with petticoats, and wears black gloves and a silver necklace, an ensemble designed by a prominent fashion house. At the event, she paces the hallway. Nigel steps down from the podium, where he had just introduced the next fashion icon. Miranda makes her way over from the table she's been sitting at, a place of honor. They had gathered in a plush banqueting suite with chandeliers hanging from the ceiling, sparkling luxuriously. Andy spies Christian sitting with Jacqueline, a rival editor known for her cunning. Miranda kisses Nigel before taking her place, acknowledging his indispensable contribution. James, a celebrated designer, gets up and salutes his fans, basking in their adoration. Andy and Nigel smile over at him, sharing a moment of professional pride. Nigel's excited smile fades and he looks up at Miranda crestfallen, realizing the shift in his expected career advancement. Pretty Jacqueline beams delightedly, reveling in her unexpected triumph. Nigel puts on a brave face and applauds her, maintaining his professional composure. Jacqueline stands, accepting her accolades. Andy looks over at Miranda incredulously, questioning the night's unfolding events. Up on the podium, Miranda smiles and applauds Jacqueline as Irv eyes her coolly, alluding to the underlying tensions in the business. Andy glances over at Christian, who looks stunned by the upheaval. James preens himself smugly, confident in his success. Nigel fidgets in his seat, contemplating his next move. Later, Andy gets into the back of a smart, black executive car, which is parked outside the venue, ready to take her back to her suite for a night of reflection.

She is wearing a dressing gown and has no makeup on. Miranda has her hand held out for them. Andy holds out a folder which Miranda ungraciously accepts. Andy's taken aback. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. test_cases.name: Subject-Action Corruption
test_cases.description: She sets them down and is bewildered to find Caroline lounging on the couch with her keys in her hand, just gazing vacantly. She's wearing a tracksuit and has messy hair. Caroline has her hand extended for them. Sam offers a letter, which Caroline dismissively receives. Sam's startled. Sam peeks down at the documents in her lap, and then observes Caroline with empathy. Caroline returns the seating plan. Back in her own cabin, Sam has switched into a tight-fitting, deep-blue dress. She examines her reflection in a large mirror and adjusts the blush on her rosy cheeks. Ron wanders in and inspects the attire she's put on. They clink their cups. Sam and Jordan in an upscale bistro. After the meal, they meander near the Big Ben. She twirls around a tree trunk. Jordan hugs her. He embraces her repeatedly. She hugs him back, looping her arm around his shoulder. They are encircled by leafless trees adorned with festive lights. There's a view of the Statue of Liberty from Jordan's hotel room window. Sam wakes up in his room alone, and puts her hand to her temple with a wince. She turns over and checks her phone on the side table. Pulled on her garments and is jumping around trying to put her boots on. Sam moves to grab her coat and topples Jordan's backpack. Jordan emerges from the restroom in a robe. Sam grabs her belongings and exits. Strolling along a futuristic bridge over the grass, she contacts Caroline's cabin. Sam returns to the hotel and hesitates before knocking on Caroline's door. Caroline and Paul close the door in her face. She's changed into a red gown with a halter neck, a flared skirt with layers, and wears white gloves and a gold bracelet. At the gathering, she strides the corridor. Ron descends from the stage. Caroline advances from the chair she's been reclining on. They had convened in a luxurious dining hall with lanterns hanging from the rafters. Sam spots Jordan sitting with Natalie. Caroline kisses Ron before assuming her position. Mark gets up and waves to his admirers. Sam and Ron grin over at him. Ron's thrilled grin diminishes and he glances up at Caroline dismayed. Cheerful Natalie grins blissfully. Ron puts on a stoic expression and honors her. Natalie rises. Sam gazes over at Caroline incredulously. Up on the stage, Caroline grins and honors Natalie as Paul regards her indifferently. Sam looks over at Jordan, who appears shocked. Mark adjusts his attire confidently. Ron squirms in his spot. Later, Sam climbs into the rear of a sleek, black luxury car, which is stationed outside the locale.

At the fair, she wanders the gallery. Nigel descends from the stage. Miranda strides over from the couch she's been reclining on. James rises and waves to his admirers. Andy and Nigel grin over at him. Nigel's joyful expression diminishes and he glances at Miranda disheartened. Glowing Jacqueline grins cheerfully. Nigel musters a cheerful expression and claps for her. Jacqueline rises. Andy gazes at Miranda incredulously. Upon the stage, Miranda grins and claps for Jacqueline as Irv observes her indifferently. He flips over and checks his compass on the bookshelf. Slipped into his boots and is zigzagging about attempting to put his scarf on. Carlos moves to seize his satchel and knocks over Sam's helmet. Sam emerges from the closet in a cape. Carlos snatches his things and exits. Skipping along a wooden pier over the gravel, he texts Hector's garage. Carlos returns to the cabin and hesitates before ringing Hector's bell. Hector and Ava slam the gate in his face. He’s switched into a red suit with a round collar, a short cape with frills, and sports red boots and a golden bracelet. At the reunion, he prances the corridor. Fernando ascends from the bench. Hector strides over from the chair he’s been reclining on. They had assembled in a quaint dining room with lanterns hanging from the rafters. Carlos notices Sam lounging with Emily. Hector hugs Fernando before grabbing his spot. Leo rises and waves to his crew. Carlos and Fernando laugh over at him. Fernando’s joyful grin shrinks and he gazes up at Hector disheartened. Cheerful Emily grins enthusiastically. Fernando maintains a courageous expression and cheers her. Emily rises. Carlos observes Hector incredulously. At the bench, Hector laughs and cheers Emily as Ava watches her coldly. Carlos peeks over at Sam, who appears bewildered. Leo grooms himself arrogantly. Fernando squirms in his chair. Later, Carlos enters the back of a sleek, red delivery truck, which is stationed outside the place.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: Andy finds Miranda in a vulnerable state, uncharacteristically dressed down and seemingly lost in thought. After completing her tasks for Miranda, Andy changes into a sleek black suit and heads out, later dining elegantly with Christian. The evening leads to a romantic encounter against the picturesque backdrop of the Eiffel Tower. The next morning, Andy wakes alone in Christian’s bed, hurrying to gather her things as he emerges from the bathroom. Rushing back to Miranda's suite, Andy tries to regroup for the day’s event. Despite her efforts, Miranda and Irv shut the door in her face, leaving Andy to prepare for the event solo. At the gathering, held in a lavish banqueting suite, Andy notices Christian with Jacqueline. Meanwhile, Nigel's happiness turns to disappointment as Miranda surprisingly applauds Jacqueline, overshadowing Nigel's moment. Andy sits in disbelief as the event unfolds, observing Nigel's forced smile and Jacqueline’s delight. Later on, she departs in an executive car, distanced from the unfolding drama.
